snippet.title: PaperKlay | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1350720/PaperKlay/

PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world.

Open Worlds
Go on this short and sweet adventure through 5 open worlds filled with challenges and collectibles around every corner. Help Chick and Nugget recover the lost eggs that were taken by evil Rev! In the world of PaperKlay you’ll run into different characters and it’s up to you to help those you meet during your journey.

A Unique Twist
Open, rotate and unfold the environment in order to experience this unique way of exploring the world. Find different types of collectibles in order to upgrade your abilities, unlock sections of the levels and help characters on your adventure.

Hand Crafted
Listen to a sweet soundtrack by Nathan Ross to accompany your adventure in this paper and cardboard world. PaperKlay is an experience that is short but jam-packed with cuteness. If that appeals to you then the PaperKlay world is waiting for you!

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/AnderssonKev
